lib/klib.h¶

void kmemcpy(char *depart, char *destination, int size)¶
Parameters

  • depart – adress of the first octet to be copied

  • destination – adress where the first octet will be copied

  • size – number of octet to be copied

void intToStr(int nb, char [] chaine)
Parameters

  • nb – number to convert into a string. Must be positiv

  • chaine – string where will be store the converted number.
